Dear Ammaji,

Thank you for all the little things that you do

The way you go about your responsibilities without much ado

Whether donning the white in hospital gown

Or in the kitchen, stirring up a delicacy of your own

All work managed with equal aplomb

and yet find time to fix achu's hair with a skillful comb


I have never seen you fret, never seen you complain

Melting everyone's heart with dedication for you to reign

But I know you can be equally stern

for my ears have endured plenty of cranks and finger turns

You know we love and you love us too

A very happy birthday to you.

Love,

Achu and Ami.

Happy Birthday Ammaji!
